product_name: Innova Disc Golf DISCatcher Traveler Disc Golf Target
long_description: Take your disc golf game with you! This Innova target sets up and folds down easily-ideal for camping, the beach and your backyard. Simple, single-action setup and take-down. Weighing in at 12 lbs., this is the lightest portable target from Innova. Unique target area net surrounds chain assembly, decreasing spit-outs and blow-throughs. Extra-wide mesh basket tray is light, durable and dries quickly. Elastic band at base of basket tray allows easy disc retrieval for disabled players. Four folding legs provide a wide, stable base; attached anchor rings and stakes keep the target in place on uneven surfaces and in windy conditions. Includes tote bag and removable flag. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Take your disc golf game with you! This Innova target sets up and folds down easily-ideal for camping, the beach and your backyard.
